name: license_plate_lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool license_plate_lookup.
Tool description: Check VIN by US license plate and state. 
VIN decoder from [VIN decoder](https://rapidapi.com/dominonet-lTpEE6zONeS/api/vin-decoder19).
[View documents](https://rapidapi.com/dominonet-lTpEE6zONeS/api/vin-decoder19/details)

API description: Perform a license plate lookup using the provided license plate number and state code.

license_plate.description: The license plate number to look up.

state_code.description:
**Run a License Plate Search By State**
AL,AK,AZ,AR,CA,CO,CT,DE,DC,FL,GA,HI,ID,IL,IN,IA,KS,KY,LA,ME,MD,MA,MI,MN,MS,MO,MT,NE,NV,NH,NJ,NM,NY,NC,ND,OH,OK,OR,PA,RI,SC,SD,TN,TX,UT,VT,VA,WA,WV,WI,WY
